summary: Every ff I’ve read (Part 3)
title: Every ff I’ve read (Part 3)
body:
i’ll bring the bread because boy, you’re the jam  

by scagnetism

Just when he’s about to stop clicking the next button and claim defeat, maybe put some posters up around town, he’s met with a picture of white cardstock lying on a table, words written in black Sharpie with careful, deliberate strokes. “Hiiii,” it reads, “if you’re reading this, you’ve found my camera! I’d love it if you could contact me so I can get it back. It’d be the nice thing to do.”

Or the AU where Harry loses his camera. Louis finds it. They fall for each other via email.

Rated: /, Words: 8,140

AU

Every Arrow That I Aim Is True 

by estrella30

“I can see you don’t believe me,” Harry says, pretending to be stern. Louis chuckles a little but doesn’t get out of the bed. “Anyway, I texted Liam and told him you’re with me. He said to stay here as long as you need, and he’ll deal with the show over there until you want to come back, all right?”

Louis doesn’t say anything again so Harry whispers, “Just stay here with me for a while, yeah? I’ll take care of you.”

Louis is quiet. He never picks his head up, but Harry can see the pillow move from where he’s nodding and his fingers tighten around Harry’s. “Yeah,” Louis says. “Yeah, all right.”

Rated: E, Words: 24,890

Canon

For Better, Worse And Mischief (I’m All Yours) 

by RedOrchid for zarah5

The One Direction PR management team decides that Harry needs to get married. Harry doesn’t want to. Louis comes up with the perfect solution to the problem.

(Working title: Fake!Husbands Whooot!)

Rated: E, Words: 37,513

Fake/Pretend Relationship, Canon

Turning Page 

by purpledaisy for SockstheDog 

“What’s your name?”

“Harry.” He draws the word out slowly, hesitantly - like he’s not sure about it. The guy knots his hands behind his back. “Harry Twist.”

“Right,” Niall says, eyes lingering suspiciously on Harry before looking back to Louis. “You wanna buy Harry a drink?”

Louis lets his eyes drip back to Harry, to his wide eyes and the way his shoulders curve down. He really is pretty – Louis will be the first one to admit it and the last one to ever say it out loud. Louis almost smirks and his lips twitch as he tilts his head, “Not particularly, no.”

-

AU: Harry Styles tries to get lost in a place he’s never been.  Louis Tomlinson has been perfecting the art of being lost for years. What they don’t expect to find is each other.

Rated: M, Words: 67,916

Famous Harry, Non-famous Louis

Elementary

by iwillpaintasongforlou for sky_reid

Harry is a kindergarten teacher who’s been roped into coaching a youth footie league, despite the fact that he doesn’t know the first thing about football. Louis is the father of one of the girls in Harry’s class who thinks he could coach circles around Harry (he can).

Rated: T, Words: 7,220

Dad Louis, Teacher Harry, Football Player Louis

june snow 

by snsk

Five years into One Direction’s extended break, Louis Tomlinson, part-time songwriter, full-time exhausted single dad, gets an invitation in the mail to a bandmate’s wedding.

In the mail, for god’s sake.

Had Niall never heard of texting?

Rated: T, Words: 17,016

Canon, Dad Louis

Dance to the Distortion 

by Lis (domesticharry)

Louis accidentally breaks Harry’s camera lens and in order to get it fixed, they decide to participate in a romantic couples study. The only issue is that they are not actually couple. Well that and the fact they cannot stand each other.

Rated: E, Words: 96,641

Fake/Pretend Relationship

Baby Heaven’s in your Eyes 

by theboyfriendstagram

They couldn’t be more different if they tried. Louis Tomlinson is 17 years old and in his last year of the most prestigious private school in Doncaster. If there’s one thing that completely annoys him, it’s that there is a poor community college right across the street.

Harry Styles is 19 years old, and (once again) in his last year of college. He goes to community college in Doncaster. He never shows up to classes and if he actually bothers to, he’s either high or drunk; sometimes both. His skin is littered with tattoos and if there’s one thing he absolutely hates, it’s the snobby students attending the private school right across from his.

Or a sixth form!AU where Harry is the fucked up bad boy with too many problems, Louis is the perfect rich boy with too much money and their schools are right across from each other. They meet at a party and that’s the last (and maybe the only) thing they need.

Rated: E, Words: 120,878

Highschool AU, Top Harry, Bottom Louis

we’re not friends, we could be anything

by nooelgallagher, yoursongonmyheart

The next second, Harry is firing back, “If I wanted to kill you I could have just poisoned your fajitas.”

Louis rolls his eyes. “Clever boy.”

Harry feels his skin start to prickle with irritation. The way Louis talks to him, so condescending… Like he’s smarter than Harry… Fuck that.

“I don’t have time for this,” Harry says. “Some of us have schoolwork to do. And jobs to get to. So if you’ll excuse me.”

Harry doesn’t wait for a reply before he pushes past Louis, hoisting his bag further up his shoulder and rushing towards the door. No, not rushing. That would imply Louis is chasing him out. He walks to the door hastily.

He’s not sure, but he thinks he hears Louis mutter “Fucking wanker” before the door to the flat clicks shut behind him.

…Or, the one where Harry and Louis are unlikely uni flatmates who definitely don’t like each other and definitely won’t fall in love (even if Liam and Niall think otherwise).

Rated: E, Words: 115,506

Top both, Bottom both

the wonderlands 

by stylinsoncity

“Somewhere between chaos and control — these are the wonderlands.”

Harry’s daughter, Andy, is signed to Louis’ girl band. Her path to success is marked by competition, chaos, and for Harry, a love affair.

Rated: M, Words: 150,540

Dad Harry, Famous Louis

Enjoying the View? 

by beaniebabyharry

Harry loves his best friend Louis. He was never bothered by the fact that he was gay (hell he is too), he doesn’t even care about the fact that he likes to wear girls clothes.

Until now.

or Harry and Louis live together and Louis likes to walk around in his panties. It’s very distracting for Harry.

Rated: E, Words: 3,444

Bottom Louis, Top Harry, PWP

The Years Haven’t Changed You 

by stylesoftheshire

The years haven’t changed Harry much. Maybe there are laughter lines around his eyes that Louis wasn’t the cause of and maybe that upsets him a little, but if Harry hadn’t been laughing then that would have upset him more.

Set four years after the band has split up and, co-incidentally, four years after Harry and Louis split up.
They meet in Sainsbury’s.

Rated: M, Words: 8,032

Canon

Roots

by cherrystreet

There aren’t many things that make Harry Styles nervous. He’s spent the past couple of years on and off various stages, filled with screaming fans, all chanting his name, loud and adoring. He’s done countless interviews, some even on live, national television, never faltering over his words, answers meticulously planned out, smooth and steady. He’s signed countless autographs, taken just as many photos, and even when he sat in his label’s studio, waiting to see how high up on the charts his single made it, he didn’t feel uneasy or uncomfortable. It’s all been unbelievably fun. No, there aren’t many things that make Harry Styles nervous.

Enter Louis Tomlinson.

Rated: E, Words: 43,233

some of it was true *

by imsosorry for teapotpourri 

It’s just - Louis wants this, wants to let himself have it, just for today. Harry’s too good to be true and London isn’t going to be on lockdown forever, so it seems only fair to allow himself this while it’s still in his reach.

(au. After a one night stand, London goes on lockdown and Harry and Louis are forced to spend the day together.)

pep talk turned into a pep rally

“Wait a second, I don’t appreciate being left out of this,” Niall pipes up. “If you’re all gonna be getting off together, I want in.”

…or, two orgies on the South American leg of the WWA tour, one Louis-centric and one Zayn-centric.

OT5, Canon

But Please, Don’t Bite 

by shyserious

“Melodic little jingle sounded from a bell hanging over the doorframe and warm indoor air curled heavily around his shivering body for the first time in months. Harry suddenly felt a sting in the corners of his eyes and had to force down a broken sob. Fuck, he was a mess. Such a mess. He had to focus.”

Rated: M, Words: 122,320

Werewolf AU, A/B/O AU, Alpha Louis, Omega Louis

i love you most 

by stylinsoncity

friends with benefits has always been enough for louis. until, of course, it isn’t.

Rated: M, Words: 12,848

College/University AU, Friends with benefits, Friends to Lovers

we’re still going, eight in the morning 

by nooelgallagher, yoursongonmyheart

Harry washes his hands quickly before grabbing his phone. His screen lights up to 3 notifications.

DJTommo is now following you!

@DJTommo mentioned you in a tweet!

Direct Message from @DJTommo!

Harry yelps, throwing his phone to Niall who just barely catches it.

Niall looks down at the phone, seeing first the tweet, then the DM. He tosses the phone back to Harry, who nearly drops it. “What are ya doing, mate! Answer him!”

Harry thinks for a moment about what he wants to say. This is his chance to actually talk to Louis Tomlinson. Louis Tomlinson messaged him directly. He can say anything he wants. He begins typing, his fingers shaky.

Niall comes over to stand next to Harry and peers down, looking to see what he wrote. When he does, he lets out a groan.

…Or, the one where Harry owns a bakery, Louis is a radio DJ, and Niall and Liam roll their eyes at their incessant flirting.

or an au where harry paints his nails and drinks strawberry milk and is too nervous for it to be nothing and louis’ just trying to figure out whats wrong with him

let’s talk about making love

Louis is just a simple phone sex line operator, but to Harry, he’s Daddy.

summary:
Just read an interesting blog about a comparison between Harry and Elton John by @seasurfacefullofclouds.  

Amazing work...and...
body:
Just read an interesting blog about a comparison between Harry and Elton John by @seasurfacefullofclouds.   Amazing work…and let’s be honest, the only way to get rid of labels is to stop using them.  Why should it matter to anyone except, oneself anyway?  People are who they are, no one is going to change them by saying they are straight or gay.  

Love is love…end of discussion.

I hope Harry continues down his own path.  He owes no one an explanation.  I believe it adds to his persona, and who cares…really.  I like his music and his aesthetics.  I like the fact he is who he is and has a take or leave it attitude.  He is like a well written, highly expressive, metaphorical, and intriguing poem, and like any work of art is completely open to interpretation.

summary: harry is nowhere near elton john's level of public relevance in the 70s. which is mostly why he's been given such an extended...
question: harry is nowhere near elton john's level of public relevance in the 70s. which is mostly why he's been given such an extended leash by sony. he didn't make the money hdd said stringer was expecting, and the distribution deal doesn't entitle them to much of his tour profit. he isn't doing 1d numbers or gained any real artistic credibility that didn't fade with sott. and his last beard was greatly ignored so his relationships no longer sell. they tend to heavily closet the valuable stars.
answer:
You state a lot of assumptions.

First, 2018 is a very different social landscape from 1976. The articles cited mention that no pop music celebrity was comfortable being out in 1976, although there were always rumors.

Artistic credibility is subjective. Elton John was widely criticized for being too popular and having no artistic vision. But artistry lasts, and opinions are always changing over time. David Bowie famously called Elton John “the Liberace, the token queen of rock.”

In the RS interview, Elton answered: Bowie’s a little crazed, I think. I didn’t understand half the things he came out with. Heavy things about ‘the rock scene,’ y’know? Boring shit.

Regardless of what you think, your feelings about Harry’s artistry is an opinion. One fact that is true is that Elton John was hugely successful at the time of his coming out interview (which may be why he felt ready for it). He had had four gold albums in two years, and every single released was expected to go to the top.

“They tend to heavily closet the valuable stars.” Well, that’s true as well, but closeting is a huge and nuanced topic to discuss. In 2018, there is also commercial value in being progressive and aligning with the LGBT community, especially if one’s fanbase has a large portion of LGBT fans.

reblog.comment:
You state a lot of assumptions.

First, 2018 is a very different social landscape from 1976. The articles cited mention that no pop music celebrity was comfortable being out in 1976, although there were always rumors.

Artistic credibility is subjective. Elton John was widely criticized for being too popular and having no artistic vision. But artistry lasts, and opinions are always changing over time. David Bowie famously called Elton John “the Liberace, the token queen of rock.”

In the RS interview, Elton answered: Bowie’s a little crazed, I think. I didn’t understand half the things he came out with. Heavy things about ‘the rock scene,’ y’know? Boring shit.

Regardless of what you think, your feelings about Harry’s artistry is an opinion. One fact that is true is that Elton John was hugely successful at the time of his coming out interview (which may be why he felt ready for it). He had had four gold albums in two years, and every single released was expected to go to the top.

“They tend to heavily closet the valuable stars.” Well, that’s true as well, but closeting is a huge and nuanced topic to discuss. In 2018, there is also commercial value in being progressive and aligning with the LGBT community, especially if one’s fanbase has a large portion of LGBT fans.

summary: Trapped in the Magic of Love.
title: Trapped in the Magic of Love.
body:
ft. Draco Malfoy

Another Failed Attempt

“Ron’s been poisoned!” I heard the phrase uttered multiple times as I walked through the hallways. I woke up late and was on my way to the Great Hall for some breakfast. I yawned as I shuffled past…

Read more…

body:
End of the affair - Part 2

Part 1

I woke up to the sound of my alarm playing. Filling the room I didn’t want to get up and leave the warmth of our bed. I look over to my phone knocking the alarm off. “Don’t leave.” He whines, pulling me in closer to him. 

“Some of us have to go to work.”

“Hey, I work.” 

“Some of us have long days. Not just one meeting, Styles.”

“Fair enough.” He rolls his eyes letting go of me. 

“Shouldn’t you ring Jess. You haven’t spoken to her since I got here.” 

“You telling me what to do now? Aren’t even my girlfriend and you are already bossing me about.” He sits up against the head board as I put my dress gown on. 

“Nope. You’ve already got a girlfriend for that.” He rolls his eyes. As I leave him to get ready. 

I finish my morning routine to find Harry in the exact spot I left him in. “What’s the plan for later?” He calls me over to the bed. “I should be finished before five. So I’ll go to my hotel and get ready, then I’ve got some work to catch up on. Shall I meet you at the restaurant?” 

“Yeah, sounds good to me.” He crawls to edge of the best to come and kiss me. “Have a great day babe.” 

“You too.” I kiss him one last time before leaving.

“I love you.”

“I love you too.” I say before leaving his hotel room. 

I had a day of shooting whilst in New York, then I needed to follow up on emails and admin afterwards. I had tried my best efforts into looking as nice as I could for Harry tonight. Black lace lingerie, and a tight emerald green mid length dress with a pair of heels. My hair was in a loose messy bun with strands falling infant of my face. 

Walking into the restaurant I inform the waitress of the name the table was booked under. She walked me over to where they both were sat. “There she is.” Jeff States climbing out of the booth to greet me straight away. He brought me into a tight hug. “It’s been too long.”

“It really has.” In the meantime Harry had climbed out of the booth too, to allow me to sit in the middle. I greet him with the same hug as Jeff to keep up appearances. I slide into the booth in between both men. “So how’s the husband?”

“He’s great.” I roll my eyes at Jeff. “How’s the missus?”

“The usual.” He replies. “I was asking Harry why Jess hasn’t turned up to this leg of the tour yet.” He states. I look at Harry raising my eyebrows. “Because she wasn’t invited,” Jeff adds. 

“You didn’t ask her?” I ask in shock at him. “Why not?” Harry just hides behind his menu. 

“Because he would rather have mistress here instead.” 

“Hey.” I shout slapping Jeff’s arm. At the same time as Harry barked his name. 

“You know I’m right.” The pair just seems to laugh. 

“Technically he’s my mistress, he isn’t married,” I said, making light of the situation. 

———————————————————————————————————————————— 

Flashback 

I had walked backstage to Harry’s dressing room. Knocking on the door he shouts for me to come in. The moment I walked through the door Harry grabbed my arm dragging me and pushing me against the wall. His lips latched onto mine by my surprise. “God I couldn’t stop thinking about you.” He says, grabbing my legs so I would wrap them around his waist. His lips move their way down to my neck. “You were amazing babe.” His leave my neck as he looks up at smiles at me. His lips then crash down on mine as the need for one another intensifies. He walks with me over to the dressing table placing me down. My hands are quick to his trousers as I unbutton quickly. He lifts my skirt up above my hips and pulling off my underwear. Dropping his trousers down a little he takes himself out of his boxers. I position my self to the edge of the dressing table so he could enter me. 

My legs were tightly wrapped around his waist as he pushed deeper into me, I was pressed against the dressing room mirror as our bodies kept knocking hair styling product over. Without noticing the door was opened and closed. “H, mate.” The sound of Jeff’s voice stopped us in our tracks. Jeff eyes suddenly left his phone and moved to us. “What the fuck do you two think you are doing?” He shouts at us both. I look to Harry not knowing what to do. “Never mind, I’ll let you two finish.” He says before leaving the dressing. 

Harry rolls his eyes before looking to me. “We need to speak to him” I say looking into Harry’s eyes. He nods, pulling himself out of me. I jumped off the dressing table making myself look presentable, putting my underwear back up and pulling my skirt back down. Harry did the same, putting himself back into his trousers. I take a seat on the couch as Harry left the dressing room to find Jeff. Luckily he was only outside waiting. “Are you two fucking kidding me?” He shouts at us as though we were two stupid teenagers. “Jeff. Don’t mate.” 

“Don’t? Me, don’t? Harry, she is fucking married.” He shouts. “She is fucking married to our friend.” 

“Don’t you think I know that?” Harry shouts in return. 

“How long as this been going on for?” 

“Nearly a year.” I answer. 

“Before the wedding?” I nod.

“For fuck’s sake (Y/N).” 

“Jeff.” Harry states. 

“And you, you have a girlfriend Harry.” He shakes his head. “Jess is probably sat paranoid that you are drinking every night. That there are hundreds of women throwing themselves at you and all along she should be paranoid her friend is screwing her boyfriend.” I stand up looking away from Jeff. He was right. What we were doing to Jess and Dan was awful. “Dan is our mate. Jess is our mate. We all go out together for meals, for holidays and trips away and all this time you two have been hooking up.” 

“It isn’t like that.” Harry said. 

“Go on Harry. What is it like?” 

“You make it sound cheap and disgusting like we enjoy having to lie to them.”

“Then why do it?” 

“I love her.” H admitted.

“Do you love him?” He asks me. 

“Yes.” 

“Right.” Jeff’s says taking a seat. 

“I should go.” I say about to leave. I stopped to pick up my handbag which was dropped in the process of our kisses. I had arranged to stay the night at Harry hotel room. He handed me the key before I left and I kissed him quickly before I left the dressing room. 

I sat in the bed nervously waiting for Harry’s return. He had never stayed back so late after a concert which caused my body to fill with anxiety. I hadn’t got a message or a phone call from him. My attention is bright to Harry walking through the hotel room door. “Hey.” He walks over to lay down on my chest. “How did it go?” I ask. Stroking his hair. His head was resting on my chest as he wrapped his hands around me. “Fine. He’s fine with it.” Harry looked up at me, his chin resting in-between my boobs. “What did he say?”

“Nothing much. He doesn’t approve but he understands why.” 

“Is she going to-“ 

“He won’t tell anyone.” Harry states. I kiss his head. “Baby, don’t worry about it.” I nodded looking down at him. “Come on let’s sleep.” 

———————————————————————————————————

Back to the restaurant. 

Amongst small conversations and catching up the food and arrived, been eaten and we were currently contemplating dessert. Harry’s hand had been placed on my leg the whole night. Making soft little circles and rubbing ever so gently. “(Y/N) will you be at MSG tomorrow?” Jeff asks. “Course I will be. I’m not going to miss it.” 

“When do you go back home?” He adds. 

“The day after the last gig.” 

“So Anne and Gemma are both arriving tomorrow?” He asks Harry. Harry just nods. He had been quiet the whole night. “Did they tell you we are going out?” I ask Harry. 

“No, I haven’t had a chance to speak to them much with the traveling.” 

“Yes. We are going to do a bit of sightseeing and some shopping.” We had decided to not get a desert and to leave as the next was an important day for everyone. Harry and I had to take separate cars back to the hotel room. We had to be brought into the back entrance of the hotel room. He had managed to arrive there a little bit before. 

I opened the room to see Harry staring down at his phone in frustration. He was already shirtless, one hand on the phone and the other holding his trousers up. “Babe, what’s wrong? You’ve been distracted all night.” 

“It’s nothing.” He forces a smile to me.

“Don’t do that.” 

“Do what?” He asks.

“Lie to me, we said we’ve never lie to each other.”

“Fine.” He throws his phone on the bed. “I’m arguing with Jess.”

“Why?”

“She’s annoyed she isn’t over here now.” He removes his trousers. 

“Why isn’t she?”

“Why do you think?” He walks over to kiss me before going into the bathroom to start getting ready for bed. “I would rather have you there.” He smiles at me looking into the mirror.

“So you told her she couldn’t come?”

“Sort of. I said people would get suspicious of her and it might lead to the relationship going public. She’s getting tired of all that.” 

“I don’t blame her.” I walk over to the table placing my handbag down and removing my heels. His phone started flashing. “H, she’s ringing you.” I shout. I decided to go into the bathroom and get ready for bed as he argued with his girlfriend. 

I came out in my silk dressing gown as he laid on the bed in his boxers trying to find something for us to watch on tv. “Everything okay?” He nods motions me to come cuddle next to him.
